s0422: Chu from Hanzhong south had Ba and Qianzhong.
s0423: The Zhou house was weak, the lords governed by force, contended to annex each other.
s0424: Qin was remote in Yong province, did not participate in the alliances of the central states lords, treated as Rong and Di.
s0425: Duke Xiao then spread benevolence, aided orphans and widows, recruited warriors, clarified merit rewards.
s0426: Issued command in the state: 'In ancient times, our Duke Mu from between Qi and Yong, cultivated virtue and practiced military affairs, pacified Jin's disorders to the east with the Yellow River as boundary, became hegemon of the western Rong and Di, expanded territory a thousand li, the Son of Heaven granted hegemony, all lords congratulated, opened enterprises for later generations, extremely glorious and beautiful.
s0427: Encountering in the past the unrest of Li, Zhao, Jian, and Chu Zi, the state had internal worries, no leisure for external affairs, the three Jin attacked and seized our former lord's Hexi lands, the lords belittled Qin, no shame greater than this.
s0428: Duke Xian ascended, pacified the borders, moved the capital to Queyang, and wished to attack east, recover Duke Mu's former lands, follow Duke Mu's policies.
s0429: I think of our former lord's intentions, constantly pained in my heart.
s0430: Guests and ministers who can put forth extraordinary plans to strengthen Qin, I will honor with office and divide land with them.'
s0431: Therefore sent troops east to besiege Xia city, west beheaded the Rong's Mi Wang.
s0432: Duke Huiwen of Qin twenty-first year, Duke Huiwen died, his son Duke Wu ascended.
s0433: Duke Wu of Qin first year, attacked the Quanrong.
s0437: Fifth year, Duke Wu died, his son Duke Zhaoxiang ascended.
s0438: Duke Zhaoxiang of Qin first year, attacked the Quanrong.
